pageContext.claim: “They think they're going to send hundreds of millions of ballots all over the United States, and it's going to come out.”
pageContext.analysis: Wrong. Some states are mailing ballots to all registered voters, accounting for 51 million voters combined, according to a Post tally. In California alone, that means 20 million ballots will be mailed. Other states, with a combined 44 million voters, are simply mailing ballot applications.
